column6: "BETRAYED!" Treachery runs rampant as Lady Octopus and Canis finally make their big play to seize control of the New York underworld, and Spider-Girl is suddenly forced to question her loyalties when she learns that Kaine plans to challenge the Black Tarantula to a death duel.
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group
